Articles.Content:
\'Ello everyone, I\'m Radion Spaceworks here with an exciting offer for you!

> ![you.jpg](http://dominickmondi.files.wordpress.com/2011/10/you.jpg)

* * *

Have you ever dreamed of flying to another location on Kerbin? Too lazy to do it yourself? Do you simply want to enjoy the trip? Well worry no more, for today you can reserve your spot to be on a flight to any of the scheduled locations with 2 other people! You can choose between luxurious passenger plane flight or economy class rocket transport. Reserve your spot today with your custom KSP name!

* * *

**Economy Class**

Craft - 

**Stellaron II**

> 
> ![2e6furs.png](http://i45.tinypic.com/2e6furs.png)
> 
> Max. Orbit - Median Kerbin Orbit (MKO)
> 
> Max. Velocity - 3400 m/s
> 
> Safe Destination - Kerbin, anywhere
> 
> Maximum Destination - Mun, anywhere

**Scheduled Flights**

Locations Open to Suggestion

**First Class**

Aircraft - 

**Averuma RV-4**

> 
> ![e9b0o7.png](http://i49.tinypic.com/e9b0o7.png)
> 
> Max. Altitude - 6500 Meters
> 
> Max. Velocity @ Cruising Altitude (1500m) - 165 m/s
> 
> Cruising Velocity - 125 m/s
> 
> Safe Range - 100 Kilometers
> 
> Max. Range - 130 Kilometers

**Scheduled Flights**

**5\*, 19\', 42' N; 86\*, 12\', 4' W - Jhazenei Shore Airfield - Flight Code: RPS-1**

Passengers - 

- [li]Open[/li]  
[li]Open[/li]  
[li]Open[/li]

**23\*, 4\', 45' N; 95\*, 33\', 26' W - Luminaria Field - Flight Code: RPS-2**

Passengers - 

- [li]Open[/li]  
[li]Open[/li]  
[li]Open[/li]

**5\*, 32\', 35' S; 81\*, 38\', 48' W - Un-Lac Airfield - Flight Code: RPS-3**

Passengers - 

- [li]Muskar XII[/li]  
[li]Joebobbenhudenschmuzar IXVL[/li]  
[li]Xenakatalakan Khonnitzahrl[/li]

* * *

**Flight Records**

**Past Flights**

**5\*, 32\', 35' S; 81\*, 38\', 48' W - Un-Lac Airfield - Flight Code: RPS-3**

Passengers - 

- [li]Muskar XII[/li]  
[li]Joebobbenhudenschmuzar IXVL[/li]  
[li]Xenakatalakan Khonnitzahrl[/li]

**Flight Videos**

**RPS-3**

[Kerbal Space Program - Radion Passenger Service Flight Recording - RPS-3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8SpbD_u-GPc#)

* * *

Simply apply for a flight in the following format - 

Name (be creative) - 

Flight Code Requested - 

Once a flight is full it will be flown and the video will be uploaded to YouTube to be viewed. If a plane crashes and you die, have fun in the big booster in the sky. You can then register another kerb for another flight. If the plane crashes and you live, we can offer your kerb another trip.

DISCLAIMER - All names are not official.

? RP? Shouldn\'t this be in the new forums?

PS: Did I get in or not?... I was a good RPer before..

> 
> ? RP? Shouldn\'t this be in the new forums?
> 
> PS: Did I get in or not?... I was a good RPer before..

It\'s kind of like what Asmodeus did with his custom space program a while back, letting people register in to be on various flights. This is similar, but with a bit of newness to it with the new space plane features and whatnot.

RPS-3

Muskar The XII (Make sure he is safe. He is king of Syldavia!)

--Suggestions--

1. Munar Orbit.

2. Mun Landing.

3. MKO.

4. A trip where you can go to the Mun and then get into an orbit Around Kerbin.

> 
> ? RP? Shouldn\'t this be in the new forums?
> 
> PS: Did I get in or not?... I was a good RPer before..

More the Spacecraft Exchange.

Name (be creative) - Joebobbenhudenschmuzar IXVL

Flight Code Requested - RPS-3

Be careful, he\'s royalty.

Xenakatalakan Khonnitzahrl

Flight Code: RPS-3

Suggestion: Minmus landing, because why the hell not?

> 
> Dummkopf Dumbsy
> 
> Flight Code: RPS-3

Sorry Dummkopf, RPS-3 is booked. Can we offer you a complimentary flight on RPS-1?

Also, RPS-3 will fly today, and I expect the video to be uploaded tomorrow. Thank you for flying RPS!

Good morning, I would like to register a Rodney Blazing for flight RPS-2, please. Oh, and don\'t hold back on the air sickness baggies. He is allergic to in-flight food.

By the way, he wishes to land at KSP-2 - visiting some relatives, his cousin works in the ATC tower.
RPS-2 for a William Kerman, please.

RPS - 3 has landed at Un Lac Airfield. Thank you for flying RPS, and fly again soon.

There will be two version for the flight videos. One, low-ish quality but with more information regarding the flight, and the other the raw video uploaded to YouTube. Right now, only one is available, the low quality. The high quality will be available soon - 

Low Quality

[Kerbal Space Program - Radion Passenger Service Flight Recording - RPS-3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8SpbD_u-GPc#)

High Quality

[http://youtu.be/jrALphQeUDU](https://youtu.be/jrALphQeUDU)

Both contain radio chatter during flight.
When you decide what to do with the rocket, I will take the first seat avalible! (Muskar XII) (Maybe Minmus or the Mun?)

Sister4sale is requesting a flight on the rocket to the Mun. He is the owner of a powerful business who can make jet fuel, and rocket fuel cheaper. 

Mun and back to KSP on the rocket
